channel.title: CVE Feed for Yongki Agustinus -- Animated Typed JS Shortcode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Yongki Agustinus -- Animated Typed JS Shortcode

item.title: CVE-2024-38679|2024-07-22T11:41:39.566Z -- yongki%20agustinus -- animated%20typed%20js%20shortcode
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Yongki Agustinus Animated Typed JS Shortcode allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Animated Typed JS Shortcode: from n/a through 2.0.
